meanings.definition: Any of the bones or segments composing the spinal column, consisting typically of a cylindrical body and an arch with various processes, and forming a foramen, or opening, through which the spinal cord passes.
meanings.sent1: The vertebrae protect the spinal cord.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the vertebrae to understand back injuries.
meanings.sent3: The vertebrae had a meeting to discuss spine health.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the vertebrae supporting her.
meanings.sent5: The vertebrae are like building blocks for the spine.
